retrieval.storage.index

Class IndexStructAbs

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.index.IndexStructAbs
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexStructClassic

    public abstract class IndexStructAbs
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for index structure Two type of index structure: Kyoto/Redis/Memory/...: collection = index.get(key) than value=collection.get(subkey) Redis: index.get(key,subkey,value)
